T:Omu.ValueInjecter.Injections.FlatLoopInjection
member.summary: FlatLoopInjection, matches unflat properties to flat ( a.b.c => abc ) override SetValue to control the how the value is set ( do type casting, ignore setting in certain scenarios etc. ) override Match to control unflat target checking

properties to look into
match func used for checking the last property in the trail
